data.question: What is the BET surface area of Mg-CUK-1L?
Does Mg-CUK-1L show selectivity for CO2 sorption over other gases?
What method was used for the synthesis of Mg-CUK-1L?
Can azobenzene undergo reversible trans-cis isomerization in Mg-CUK-1L?
What is the coordination mode of the Mg(II) centers in Mg-CUK-1L?
What is the maximum measured adsorption capacity for CO2 in Mg-CUK-1L?
Is the dehydrated structure of Mg-CUK-1L stable upon cooling?
data.answer: No, single crystals of Mg-CUK-1L fractured upon cooling.

data.question: What is the effect of irradiation at 320 nm on azobenzene-loaded Mg-CUK-1L?
data.answer: It causes a significant diminishment of the band at 317 nm, indicating trans-to-cis isomerization.

data.question: What is the thermal stability window of Mg-CUK-1L?
Does Mg-CUK-1L retain its crystallinity after loading with azobenzene?
What is the role of cppH2 in the synthesis of Mg-CUK-1L?
data.answer: It acts as a ligand, extending the structure by an extra phenyl ring.

data.question: Is Mg-CUK-1L isoreticular with the M-CUK-1 materials?
What is the accessible volume of Mg-CUK-1L?
Does Mg-CUK-1L undergo pore collapse upon dehydration?
data.answer: No, it resisted pore collapse upon dehydration.

data.question: What is the molar sorption selectivity for CO2/N2 in Mg-CUK-1L?
What is the effect of irradiation at 460 nm on azobenzene-loaded Mg-CUK-1L?
data.answer: It causes isomerization back to the trans state.

data.question: What is the crystallographic space group of Mg-CUK-1L?
Can Mg-CUK-1L selectively adsorb p-xylene and p-divinylbenzene?
What is the effect of dehydration on the crystallographic ab-plane dimensions of Mg-CUK-1L?
data.answer: It shows a concertina distortion compared to the fully hydrated structure.

data.question: Is the adsorption of CO2 in Mg-CUK-1L reversible?
data.answer: Yes, it displays reversible, multistep gated sorption of CO2.
